content.rendered:
Thanks for purchasing a Dumpster subscription operated by Baloota Applications Ltd.

We offer a full money-back guarantee for all subscriptions offered within Dumpster. If you are not satisfied with the experience that you have purchased from us, you can get your money back no questions asked. You are eligible for a full reimbursement within 30 calendar days of your purchase.

After the 30-day period you will no longer be eligible and won’t be able to receive a refund. We encourage our customers to take advantage of the free trial period to ensure Dumpster fits their needs.

If you have any additional questions or would like to request a refund, feel free to contact us.
